translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽Dhamma Paccanīya, Tikatika Paṭṭhānapāḷi

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)🔽11.2. Kusalattika, Vipākattika🔽Nakusalaṁ navipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Nakusalaṁ navipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Nakusalaṁ navipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Nakusalaṁ navipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipāko ca naabyākato navipāko ca dhammā
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya  kusala attika vipāka attika  na kusalam na vipākam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na vipākaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  na kusalam na vipākam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na vipākaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  na kusalam na vipākam dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ na vipākaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  na kusalam na vipākam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na vipāko ca na abyākataḥ na vipāko ca dhammā
translated: .. The Triad of the Wholesome, the Triad of the Resultant

original: Naabyākataṁ navipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.🔽Nakusalaṁ navipākañca naabyākataṁ navipākañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.🔽Naakusalaṁ navipākañca naabyākataṁ navipākañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.🔽Nakusalaṁ navipākañca naakusalaṁ navipākañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. analyzed: na abyākatam na vipākam dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ na vipākaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā cha  na kusalam na vipākañca na abyākatam na vipākañca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na vipākaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca  na akusalam na vipākañca na abyākatam na vipākañca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na vipākaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca  na kusalam na vipākañca na akusalam na vipākañca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na vipākaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi  hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa sabbattha vitthāro
translated: With an unwholesome root-cause as condition, an unwholesome root-cause arises, by way of root-cause condition … (six times, omitting the last two sections.)🔽With a wholesome root-cause and an unwholesome root-cause as condition, a wholesome root-cause arises, by way of root-cause condition … (five times, omitting the last two sections.)🔽With a wholesome root-cause and an unwholesome root-cause as condition, an unwholesome root-cause arises, by way of root-cause condition … (five times, omitting the last two sections.)🔽With a wholesome root-cause and an unwholesome root-cause as condition, a wholesome root-cause arises, by way of root-cause condition … (three times, omitting the last two sections.) (Abbreviated.)🔽With a root-cause as condition, there is (the arising of) nineteen kinds of resultant (phenomena) … (omitting the last two sections.)🔽With a root-cause as condition, there is (the arising of) nine kinds of root-causes … (omitting the last two sections.)🔽With a root-cause as condition, there is (the arising of) nineteen kinds of (phenomena) that are not root-causes … (omitting the last two sections.)
